articles.title: 'Cyberpunk 2077': New gameplay features and braindance editor revealed - Micky News
articles.description: The recent Night City Wire stream for Cyberpunk 2077 showcased on of the game's most exciting features and so much more.
articles.content: There’s a lot we know about Cyberpunk 2077, but it seems like there’s a lot that the developers have yet to reveal as well. As such, the Night City Wire stream served as a great outlet to reveal more… [+2235 chars]
